channel.title: Adding a teleport menu
channel.description:
I have 3 minigames on my final devo source and I want to make it so when you click the watchtower tele you get a menu with the 3 minigames and you can click the one u want to go to.
I want the same when that delta uses for the pking teleport. How would I do this on final devo?

item.title: Adding a teleport menu
item.dc:creator: @mod_damo mod damo
item.description:
@mod_damo wrote:

Here is mine, You have to change it to ur server.

case 1167: case 13045: teleEffect = 1; changeText126("Travel To", 2493); changeText126("Edgeville", 2494); changeText126("East Dragons (Wilderness)", 2495); changeText126("Caslte (Wilderness)", 2496); changeText126("Varrock", 2497); changeText126("Mage Bank", 2498); sendFrame164(2492); break; case 1540: case 13069: teleEffect = 2; changeText126("Travel To", 2493); changeText126("Rock Golem", 2494); changeText126("Dagganoth", 2495); changeText126("Elf Warrior", 2496); changeText126("Moss Giant", 2497); changeText126("Slayer Tower", 2498); sendFrame164(2492); break; case 1541: case 13079: teleEffect = 3; changeText126("Travel To", 2493); changeText126("Barrows", 2494); changeText126("Fight Caves", 2495); changeText126("Pest Control", 2496); changeText126("Assault", 2497); changeText126("Duel Arena", 2498); sendFrame164(2492); break; case 7455: case 13087: teleEffect = 4; changeText126("Travel To", 2493); changeText126("Warriors Guild", 2494); changeText126("Duel Tournament", 2495); changeText126("Fun Pking", 2496); changeText126("Castle Wars", 2497); changeText126("Town Pking", 2498); sendFrame164(2492); break; case 13095: case 18470: teleEffect = 5; changeText126("Travel To", 2493); changeText126("General Graardor", 2494); changeText126("Commander Zilyana", 2495); changeText126("K'ril Tsutsaroth", 2496); changeText126("Kree'arra", 2497); changeText126("Home", 2498); sendFrame164(2492); break; case 2494: if (teleEffect == 1) { wildLvl = (((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1); if (IsInFightCave() || isInPitGame() || isInPitRoom() || isInCastleWars() || isInDuelTournament() || isInTownPking() || duelStatus == 3 || wildLvl >= 20 && WildArea() || meleeFightStatus == 1) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport from here."); break; } if (teleBlockDelay > 0) { sendMessage("You are still teleBlocked!"); break; } startTele(3087, 3512, 0, 714, 715, 308, 4, 18431); } if (teleEffect == 2) { wildLvl = (((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1); item.title: Adding a teleport menu
item.dc:creator: @dwarvenknight dwarvenknight
item.description:
@dwarvenknight wrote:

ok I have that already. The text comes up but of course it doesnâ€™t do anything when you click the text.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a teleport menu
item.dc:creator: @mod_damo mod damo
item.description:
@mod_damo wrote:

Just replace the one with the one on delta.
I think you should use this,

case 1541: case 13079: teleEffect = 1; changeText126("Travel To", 2493); changeText126("Barrows", 2494); changeText126("Fight Caves", 2495); changeText126("Pest Control", 2496); changeText126("Assault", 2497); changeText126("Duel Arena", 2498); sendFrame164(2492); break;

Change the 2 case names to your watchtower number.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a teleport menu
item.dc:creator: @dwarvenknight dwarvenknight
item.description:
@dwarvenknight wrote:

I have 3 minigames on my final devo source and I want to make it so when you click the watchtower tele you get a menu with the 3 minigames and you can click the one u want to go to.

I want the same when that delta uses for the pking teleport. How would I do this on final devo?

Read full topic
